entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
